description: Set the font and settings used to render the title at the top of the plot. If no plot name is specified, the current view is assumed.

keywords.name: s
keywords.description: Plot name. If not specified, the current view is assumed.

keywords.name: text
keywords.description: Title text and font settings for the plot.

examples.description: Set title of current plot to 'My Simulation'

python_sdk_alternative.workaround: itasca.command('plot <name> title <text>') - no direct Python SDK method
